title: Mini-Ep 177: Bless The Butt
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 177: Bless The Butt
itunes:subtitle: Kate shocks Doree with her new hobby, and Doree’s mood improves significantly after wearing Real Clothes™. Then, listeners share their butt hair removal tips, discuss using glycolic acid on dry feet, and ask for tips on commemorating monumental life mo...
description:
Kate shocks Doree with her new hobby, and Doree’s mood improves significantly after wearing Real Clothes™. Then, listeners share their butt hair removal tips, discuss using glycolic acid on dry feet, and ask for tips on commemorating monumental life moments.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

For Office Hours, click here.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:


ECOTOOLS - Shop the BioBlender at your local retailers and learn more at ecotools.com

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.


MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
